trans-unit.source: Represents an abstraction of the caller's context, which provides access to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlPipe" />, <see cref="T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlTriggerContext" />, and <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 表示呼叫端內容的抽象，提供對 <see cref="T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlPipe" />、<see cref="T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlTriggerContext" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity" /> 物件的存取。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlContext> object can be used to obtain the trigger context (for code executing in a trigger) and the pipe object (when available, such as in stored procedures).
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlContext>物件可以用來取得該觸發程序內容 （適用於觸發程序中執行的程式碼） 和管道物件 （可用時，例如預存程序）。

trans-unit.source: It can also be used to obtain a <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> object that represents the Microsoft Windows identity of the calling client, if the client authenticated with the server using integrated authentication.
trans-unit.target: 它也可用來取得<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity>物件，表示呼叫的用戶端，Microsoft Windows 身分識別，如果用戶端驗證伺服器使用整合式驗證。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a new <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlDataRecord> and its <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlMetaData>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立新<xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlDataRecord>及其<xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlMetaData>。

trans-unit.source: The example then marks the beginning of a result set using the <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlPipe.SendResultsStart%2A> method, sends records with example data back to the client using the <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlPipe.SendResultsRow%2A> method, and marks the end of the result set with the <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlPipe.SendResultsEnd%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 範例接著標示結果集使用的開頭<xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlPipe.SendResultsStart%2A>方法，會將範例資料與記錄傳送回用戶端會使用<xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlPipe.SendResultsRow%2A>方法，並以設定結果的結尾標記<xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlPipe.SendResultsEnd%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the calling code is running within SQL Server, and if the context connection can be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 指定呼叫程式碼是否在 SQL Server 中執行，且是否可存取內容連接。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the context connection is available and the other <see cref="T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlContext" /> members can be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 如果內容連接可用且可存取其他 <see cref="T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlContext" /> 成員，則為 <see langword="True" />。

trans-unit.source: If this property returns false, all the other <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlContext> members throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> if used.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性會傳回 false，所有其他<xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlContext>成員擲回<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>如果使用。

trans-unit.source: If this property returns false, any attempt to open a connection object that has "context connection=true" in the connection string fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性會傳回 false，任何嘗試開啟連接物件的 「 內容連接 = true"的連接字串中會失敗。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: When using ADO.NET for data-access, if a piece of code may run both inside SQL Server (using common language runtime integration) and outside SQL Server, this property can be used to check whether the context connection is available.
trans-unit.target: 如果一段程式碼可能會執行 （使用 common language runtime 整合） 的 SQL Server 內部和外部 SQL Server，請使用 ADO.NET 存取資料，這個屬性可用來檢查是否可以使用內容連接。

trans-unit.source: Gets the pipe object that allows the caller to send result sets, messages, and the results of executing commands back to the client.
trans-unit.target: 取得管道物件，允許呼叫端將結果集、訊息和執行命令的結果傳送回用戶端。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlPipe" /> if a pipe is available, or <see langword="null" /> if called in a context where pipe is not available (for example, in a user-defined function).
trans-unit.target: 如果管道可用，則為 <see cref="T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlPipe" /> 的執行個體 (Instance)；如果在管道不可用的內容中呼叫 (例如，在使用者定義函式中)，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If invoked from outside SQL Server, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果從 SQL Server 外部，叫用<xref:System.NotSupportedException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: Gets the trigger context used to provide the caller with information about what caused the trigger to fire, and a map of the columns that were updated.
trans-unit.target: 取得觸發程序內容，用於向呼叫端提供何者引發觸發程序的相關資訊，以及更新之資料行的對應。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlTriggerContext" /> if a trigger context is available, or <see langword="null" /> if called outside of a trigger invocation.
trans-unit.target: 如果觸發程序內容可用，則為 <see cref="T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlTriggerContext" /> 的執行個體；如果從觸發程序引動過程外部呼叫，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlTriggerContext> object can only be retrieved from within a common language runtime trigger.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlTriggerContext>只可擷取物件從通用語言執行階段觸發程序內。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlContext.TriggerContext%2A> property is accessed from outside of SQL Server, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlContext.TriggerContext%2A>從 SQL Server 外部存取屬性<xref:System.NotSupportedException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft Windows identity of the caller.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端的 Microsoft Windows 識別。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity" /> instance representing the Windows identity of the caller, or <see langword="null" /> if the client was authenticated using SQL Server Authentication.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity" /> 執行個體，表示呼叫端的 Windows 識別；如果使用 SQL Server 驗證 (SQL Server Authentication) 驗證用戶端，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Common language runtime (CLR) code inside SQL Server is always invoked in the context of the process account.
trans-unit.target: 在 SQL Server 內的 common language runtime (CLR) 程式碼會永遠叫用處理序帳戶的內容中。

trans-unit.source: If it is necessary for the code to perform an action using calling user’s identity instead of the SQL Server process identity, then an impersonation token should be obtained through this property.
trans-unit.target: 如果有必要的程式碼執行的動作，使用呼叫使用者的身分識別，而不 SQL Server 處理序身分識別，然後模擬語彙基元應該透過這個屬性取得。

trans-unit.source: After obtaining the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> object, callers can impersonate the client account and perform actions on their behalf.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> 物件之後，呼叫端可以模擬用戶端帳戶，並代表它執行動作。

trans-unit.source: If invoked from outside SQL Server, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果從 SQL Server 外部，叫用<xref:System.NotSupportedException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: Only assemblies marked with `EXTERNAL_ACCESS` or `UNSAFE` permissions can access this property.
trans-unit.target: 只有以 `EXTERNAL_ACCESS` 或 `UNSAFE` 使用權限標記的組件才能存取此屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to get the Windows identity of the calling client and impersonate the client.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何取得呼叫用戶端的 Windows 身分識別，並模擬用戶端。

trans-unit.source: See "Impersonation Sample" in SQL Server Books Online for an example of impersonation using the <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlContext.WindowsIdentity%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 「 模擬範例 」 SQL Server 線上叢書 》 中的模擬使用範例，請參閱 <<c0> <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlContext.WindowsIdentity%2A> 屬性。
